Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On July 23, 2025, JPMorgan Chase & Co. closed a public offering of $4,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Subordinated Notes due 2036 (the “Subordinated Notes”). The offering of the Subordinated Notes was registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3(File No. 333-285537),as amended. In connection with this offering, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Subordinated Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this report.
